q1.name: Lunge
q1.target_range: {{tip|cr|icononly = true}} {{tt|360|Maximum dash range}} / {{tt|50|Minimum dash range}} / {{tt|420|Stab range}}
description: {{sbc|Active:}} '''Fiora''' {{tip|dashes}} a short distance in the target direction then stabs a nearby enemy if one is present. ''Lunge'' can damage [[structures]] and {{tip|ward|wards}}. Stabbing an enemy reduces ''Lunge's'' {{sti|cooldown}} by 50%.
The stab deals {{as|physical damage}} and applies [[on-hit effect]]s.
''Lunge hits enemies regardless of having {{tip|sight}} of them or not.''
'''''Fiora's''' other abilities can be cast during the dash without cancelling it.''
q1.notes:
* ''Lunge'' deals {{tip|basic damage}}, but also triggers spell effects by dealing an additional 0 {{tip|spell damage}}.
** ''Lunge'' cannot {{tip|critically strike}}.
* ''Lunge'' does not apply [[on-attack]] effects apart from certain exceptions.
** It does apply {{nie|Energized}} as if it was an [[on-hit]] effect.
** It does not stack {{ii|Guinsoo's Rageblade}} nor trigger Phantom Hit.
* The stab prioritizes in order of:
** Enemy champion affected by {{ai|Grand Challenge|Fiora}}.
** {{as|Vitals|buzzword}} facing '''Fiora'''.
** Champions who would die to the strike.
** The nearest champion (based on {{tip|center range}}).
** Enemies that would die to the strike.
** The closest enemy.
** Structures
** Wards.
* ''Lunge'' will not attempt to strike [[jungle plants]].
* '''Fiora''' does not need {{tip|sight}} of a target to stab it.
* '''Fiora''' does not stab if the {{tip|dash}} is {{tip|interrupt|interrupted}}.
* '''Fiora''' cannot cast or buffer {{si|Flash}} during the dash.
** '''Fiora''' can cast {{ii|Hextech Protobelt-01}} during the dash, potentinally interrupting it based on the timing, preventing the stab if it does.
* The dash '''can''' pass through walls.
* Will land (priority order unchanged) even if '''Fiora''' dies.
* ''Lunge's'' dash speed is affected by movement speed.

w1.name: Riposte
description: {{sbc|Active:}} '''Fiora''' poises to strike in the target direction for {{fd|0.75}} seconds, during which she's unable to act but parries any incoming sources of non-[[turret]] damage as well as gains {{tip|Cc-immune|crowd control immunity}} and {{tip|debuff}} immunity.
After the duration, '''Fiora''' sends a shock forward with her sword, dealing {{as|magic damage}} to enemies in a line.

The first enemy champion struck is also {{tip|slow|slowed}} and {{tip|cripple|crippled}} by 50% for 2 seconds. If '''Fiora''' parries at least one {{tip|immobilize|immobilizing}} effect, ''Riposte'' {{tip|stun|stuns}} the target for the same duration instead.
w1.notes:
* ''Riposte'' will not resist allied {{tip|crowd control}}.
* ''Riposte'' does not resist {{tip|nearsight}}.
* '''Fiora''' cannot be {{tip|execute|executed}} by {{cai|Death from Below|Pyke}} during ''Riposte'' but she can by {{bi|Aspect of the Dragon}}.
* {{tip|Immobilize|Immobilizing}} effects include those from {{ui|Blast Cone}} (only if triggered by an enemy) and {{tip|monster|epic monsters}}.
* {{tip|Debuff}} immunity includes [[summoner spells]], such as {{si|Exhaust}} and {{si|Ignite}}, as well as [[damage over time]] and other effects.
* {{tip|Spell shield}} will also prevent {{as|Vitals|buzzword}} from being triggered.
* ''Riposte'' takes priority if '''Fiora''' is being protected by a {{tip|spell shield}}. It does not take priority if she has a source of {{tip|cc-immune|crowd control immunity}} other than her own (i.e. {{ai|Black Shield|Morgana}}).
* {{tip|Shield|Shields}} take priority over ''Riposte''.

e1.name: Bladework
description: {{sbc|Active:}} '''Fiora's''' next two [[basic attack]]s [[on-attack]] within 4 seconds gain {{sti|range|25 '''bonus''' range}} and {{sti|{{as|'''bonus''' attack speed}}}}.

The first attack {{tip|slow|slows}} the target by 30% for 1 second but cannot {{tip|critically strike}}. The second attack will {{tip|critically strike}} for {{sti|critical damage modifiers|{{as|'''reduced''' critical damage}}}} (including to {{tip|turrets|structures}}).
e1.notes:
* {{ii|Infinity Edge}} is not affected by the critical damage reduction and will increase the damage by 25% AD, instead of multiplying it by {{fd|112.5}}%.
* {{tip|Spell shield}} will only block the slow from the first hit.
* {{Pending for test}}: ''Bladework's'' interaction with {{tip|dodge|dodging}}, {{tip|block|blocking}}, and {{tip|blind|blinding}} effects.
